translation.zh: 我们很快就到家了 莉莉安娜

translation.en: Don't play with me today, child.
translation.zh: 孩子 今天你就别调皮了

translation.en: I'm too old, and my backside is too easy a target.
translation.zh: 我太老了 你轻易就能打中我的臀部

translation.en: Your father has been asking for you.
You'll be the death of me.

translation.zh: 娜南 跟我说那故事

translation.en: Put your two feet next to mine, and we'll see.

translation.zh: 说嘛 娜南 拜托

translation.en: One day, not so long ago...
your mother was sitting in the window,
looking out on the snow that covered the land.
-She was sewing a cap. -A winter cap.
And wishing for a child to grow inside her belly.
Suddenly, she pricked her finger with the needle,
translation.zh: 她的针突然刺伤了手指

translation.en: and her blood fell into the snow.
And she looked and thought to herself, "I would like a baby boy."
translation.zh: 她看着雪地并对自己说 “我想要个小男孩”

translation.en: [chuckling] Go on with you. You know it better than I do.
translation.zh: 你来说吧 你比我还清楚呢

translation.en: A little girl with hair as black as the ebony window frame
translation.zh: 一个头发如黑檀木窗框般乌黑

translation.en: and skin as pale as the snow and lips as red as blood.
translation.zh: 皮肤如白雪般白晰 嘴唇像鲜血般红的小女孩

translation.en: -[Lilli] Good day. -[woman 3] Always in such a hurry.
What kind of mischief have you been up to today?
translation.zh: 你今天又做了什么坏事啦？

translation.en: I picked roses and irises from the garden with Greta and Ilsa.
translation.zh: 我跟葛瑞塔和艾尔莎 在花园里采了玫瑰和鸢尾花

translation.en: Papa, why does God give us wings when we die?
translation.zh:
爸爸 我们死后
神为什么要给我们翅膀？

translation.en: God gives us wings so we can fly out from paradise
translation.zh: 神给我们翅膀 好让我们 飞出天堂 眺望这世界

translation.en: and look down upon the world.
translation.zh: 飞出天堂 眺望这世界

translation.en: Does Mama look down on me? Yes,
and she smiles when she hears your prayers.
translation.zh: 而且她听见你祈祷时都会微笑

translation.en: What if she doesn't like me?
You are welcome in my house. Thank you, Frederick.
translation.zh:
-欢迎你到我家
-谢谢 佛德列克
莉莉安娜 你到哪去了？

translation.en: Lilli, I want you to meet Lady Claudia.
translation.zh: 莉莉 过来见见克劳蒂亚夫人

translation.en: Can I put her in a box?
And what will you do with her when she grows wings?
translation.zh: 它长出翅膀以后 你要怎么办？
我的盒子里面有特别的惊喜喔

translation.en: with a special surprise inside just for you.
translation.zh: 我的盒子里面有特别的惊喜喔 特地给你的

translation.en: Treat him well, and he will always be faithful.
translation.zh: 好好待它 它就会永远忠诚

translation.en: Look, Nannau. [Nannau] Come along now, Lilliana.
translation.zh:
-看 娜南
-孩子 过来吧

translation.en: Now, it is yours as well.
God did not bless him with a graceful tongue,
translation.zh: 神并未赐与他说话能力

translation.en: but he more than compensates with the wit of his hands.
translation.zh: 但却给了他灵巧的双手做为补偿

translation.en: Well-- [clears throat] I will leave you to unpack.
[Claudia] What a lovely view. [Nannau] Yes, My Lady.
translation.zh:
-这里的景观真美
-是的 夫人

translation.en: Please be careful. It was my mother's.
translation.zh: 请小心些 那是我母亲的

translation.en: Tomorrow, I will be a wife.
What would Mother say if she could see me now?
translation.zh:
母亲要是能看到我
不知道会怎么说？

translation.en: Would she be happy for me?
knowing that the world which so despised her...
translation.zh: 因为这个鄙弃她的世界
古斯塔夫 我的确爱他

translation.en: [Frederick] I just wanted to be sure that you have everything you need.
translation.zh: 我只想确定你东西都齐了

translation.en: Thank you, My Lord, but I am not well provided for at all.
translation.zh:
谢谢你 大人
但你对我实在招待不周

translation.en: I have everything I need but...
I love to hear the sound of my name on your lips.
translation.zh: 我喜欢听你叫我的名字

translation.en: -Your hands are cold. -Warm them for me.
I saw you come in here, child.
translation.zh: 我看到你进来了 孩子

translation.en: [priest] May she rest in peace forever and ever. Amen.
Do you remember my mother, Ilsa?
translation.zh: 艾尔莎 你记得我母亲吗？

translation.en: I was young, but I remember her.
translation.zh: 我那时很小 但我记得她

translation.en: My father worshipped her, didn't he?
It's not for me to say, My Lady.
translation.zh: 这就不是我能说的了 夫人

translation.en: [Ilsa] What? Back so soon from Paris?
translation.zh: 什么？这么快就从巴黎回来了？

translation.en: Hold on, now. You can't go running off in your shift.
translation.zh: 等等 你不能穿这连身裙乱跑

translation.en: Don't you ever wonder what's out there, Ilsa,
translation.zh: 艾尔莎 你可曾想过
在田野和城墙外有什么吗？

translation.en: The beasts of the forest, I imagine.
translation.zh: 我想有森林里的野兽吧

translation.en: There must be more to the world than a forest.
Why would you want to leave your good home?
translation.zh: 你为何想离开温暖的家呢？

translation.en: Because it's not the same home anymore. It hasn't been for a long time.
translation.zh: 因为这已经不是同一个家了 很久以前就不是了

translation.en: [Claudia] Nine years... of casting the runes.
Nine long years of waiting for you to come...
and now you move inside of me.
You grow stronger with every beat of my heart.
translation.zh: 你随着我的心跳愈益强壮

translation.en: And I seem to grow more beautiful with each beat of yours.
translation.zh:
我似乎也跟着你的心跳
变得更加美丽

translation.en: -[Lilli chuckles] -It was round, like a ball,
and on it was a picture of all the lands in the world.
translation.zh: 上面有全世界国家的图

translation.en: Tell me about Paris. Tell me how the ladies spend their days.
translation.zh:
跟我说说巴黎的事
那边的女士如何打发时间？
霍夫曼夫人 古腾博格医生 旅途愉快吗？

translation.en: -How was your trip? -Much too long, I'm afraid.
translation.zh: 古腾博格医生 旅途愉快吗？ 恐怕是太长了

translation.en: It doesn't show on you at all.
-You're looking radiant, as always. -Oh, thank you.
Lilli, shouldn't you be getting ready for tonight?
translation.zh: 莉莉 你该为今晚打扮一下了吧

translation.en: I wanted to speak with Peter for a moment.
translation.zh: 我想跟彼德说一会儿话

translation.en: But your dress is not appropriate for such a conversation.
translation.zh: 但你的服装并不适合这样的交谈
两位女士 我失陪了

translation.en: Lilli, I have a dress for you to try on... for tonight.
translation.zh: 莉莉 我有条裙子可让你今晚穿

translation.en: Well, I think if you're going to wear it tonight, you should try it on now.
translation.zh:
如果你今晚要穿这件
应该现在就去试

translation.en: Ilsa, will you help Lilli into it?
translation.zh: 艾尔莎 帮莉莉穿上吧 还要…

translation.en: -And cover your hair-- -I don't know if I'm going to wear it.
It's just like all my other dresses.
translation.zh: 跟我其它的裙子差不多

translation.en: I want to wear something special for tonight.
But this is special. I wore it myself when I was a girl.
translation.zh: 这件很特别 我小时候就穿这件

translation.en: Lilli, why must we... struggle so?
translation.zh: 莉莉 我们一定要争执吗？
佛德列克 你对我今晚的晚宴服

translation.en: You have said nothing about my gown tonight.
[man] A blessing on your child, Lady Hoffman.
translation.zh: 祝福您的孩子 霍夫曼夫人

translation.en: [woman] To a healthy son, My Lord. You make "always" sound quite monotonous.
-Where's Lilli? -It's her habit to be late.
translation.zh: 莉莉呢？ 她习惯迟到

translation.en: How could she be late tonight, of all nights?
translation.zh: 这么特别的晚上她怎么可以迟到

translation.en: Must we spend all of our time worrying about Lilli?
translation.zh:
我们有必要花所有时间
去担心莉莉吗？

translation.en: [woman 2] To a healthy child, My Lady.
translation.zh: 愿您生下健康的孩子 夫人

translation.en: Lilli, why are you wearing your mother's gown?
translation.zh: 莉莉 你怎么穿你妈的晚宴服？

translation.en: I wanted you to be proud of me.
Your silence is no comfort to me, Peter.
translation.zh: 彼德 你的沉默让我不安
佛德列克 婴儿流产了

translation.en: She is in no danger... but she will never bear another child.
translation.zh: 她无大碍 但无法再生育

translation.en: Don't let them throw him away.
Why is this happening to me?
Why is this happening to me?
I will always tell you the truth.
Yes. There is so much to envy.
I know we've never gotten along.
I know I pushed you away.
I must have blamed you for so many things...
translation.zh: 我一定把一切都怪在你头上

translation.en: but I never meant to hurt you.
You're such a lovely girl, Lilli.
translation.zh: 你是个很可爱的女孩 莉莉

translation.en: I don't think I ever realized...
[Peter] I have very much enjoyed our time together these past few weeks.
translation.zh:
过去几周来跟你在一起
我觉得非常愉快

translation.en: I must be leaving for Paris in a few days.
translation.zh: 几天后我就要出发去巴黎了

translation.en: I intend to ask your father for your hand in marriage.
translation.zh: 我想要请你父亲把你嫁给我
抱歉 古腾博格医生

translation.en: but Lady Hoffman requests your presence at once.
translation.zh: 霍夫曼夫人请你立刻过去

translation.en: Will you ride in with me?
I'll meet you at the stables.
What's wrong? Are you all right?
How did she look in that final moment?
Did she beg for her life?
Did she know it was me?
Oh, brother, you mustn't feel remorse.
translation.zh: 弟弟 你不需要感到自责

translation.en: The blood you spilled was just the venom of a scheming child.
translation.zh:
那些溅出来的血
只是狡猾孩子的毒液罢了

translation.en: Why don't you take what's left to the kitchen...
translation.zh: 把剩下的尸体拿去厨房如何？

translation.en: put it in the stew by the fire.
What the devil is keeping them?

translation.zh: 你担太多心了 佛德列克

translation.en: I'm sure she'll be arriving any moment.

translation.zh: 佛德列克 你得吃东西
大人 抱歉我来打扰

translation.en: -[Frederick] What is it, Peter? -I've just come from the stables.
translation.zh:
-彼德 怎么了？
-我刚从马厩那边来

translation.en: Your groomsman found Lilli's horse on the road.
translation.zh: 马夫在路边发现了莉莉的马

translation.en: If you want to live, don't make a sound.

translation.zh: 别动 开门 到楼梯后面

translation.en: Mind the stairs. Lay him on the table.
translation.zh: 别动 开门 到楼梯后面 把他放在桌上

translation.en: I've been praying since you left that you would find her.
translation.zh: 自你离开后 我一直祈祷你能找到她

translation.en: We have to keep looking. We have to.
translation.zh: 我们一定得继续找 一定要

translation.en: Of course. We will, my beloved.
translation.zh: 我的爱 我们当然会的

translation.en: Why are you here? What's your name, child?
translation.zh:
-你为什么来这里？
-孩子 你叫什么名字？

translation.en: Then she won't make a fuss when the wolves eat her.
translation.zh: 那狼吃她时 就不会大吵大闹

translation.en: I bet she tastes good too.
translation.zh: 我想她尝起来应该也不错
我父亲是佛德列克霍夫曼

translation.en: So, we got us a little princess here.
translation.zh: 所以我们这位是小公主呢

translation.en: Do you want to see what Lord Hoffman and his judges
translation.zh: 你想看霍夫曼大人和他的法官

translation.en: [woman's voice] Why did you betray me, traitor?
translation.zh: 你为何背叛我 叛徒？

translation.en: Why are you treating me this way? I've done nothing wrong to any of you.
translation.zh: 你们为什么这样对我？ 我又没有对你们做坏事

translation.en: A kiss. A bow and a kiss.
Here, Princess, kiss this here pair of mugs.
translation.zh: 来 公主 亲亲这边这个屁股吧

translation.en: You boys don't see it, do you?
translation.zh: 你们这些人就是不懂 对吧？

translation.en: We could get rich off this little morsel.
translation.zh: 我们能靠这小妞赚大钱

translation.en: Your brain's gone soggy with that rotgut you're always swilling.
translation.zh: 你的脑袋已被酒灌昏啦

translation.en: We scratch around here like rats in the ground,
translation.zh: 我们在这里跟老鼠一样过苦日子

translation.en: and what does it ever get us?
Closer to the mother lode, boy.
No one's asking you to stay, are they?
I bet your daddy wishes his little girl was back home again.
translation.zh:
我敢打赌 你父亲希望
他的小女儿快回家

translation.en: ...offer just about all his gold to have his little princess back home again...
translation.zh:
…他一定愿意拿出所有黄金
只要能找回女儿

translation.en: -Get off me! -...safe... -without so much as a scratch on her. -[grunts]
Though I'm sure he wouldn't mind too much
if we took just a little something for ourselves...
translation.zh: 在我们把你送回去之前

translation.en: I mean, he's a big man, right?
translation.zh: 我是说 他是大男人了吧？

translation.en: Maybe you ought to soak yourself in the river.
translation.zh: 或许你该去河里泡一泡

translation.en: I'm just trying to keep things lively.
translation.zh: 我只是想让气氛活泼点

translation.en: [man 1] Why don't you just leave? [man 4] Go on.
All of you is gonna die.
The world is a dangerous place, Princess. Keep this close.
translation.zh:
公主 这是个危险的世界
拿这个防身

translation.en: What if she flees? Runs away?
translation.zh: 要是她逃走呢？跑掉了呢？

translation.en: She'll never find her way out of here.
[man 1] The little princess is following us.
-[man 1] Hey, Lars. -[caws] Maybe she'll help us find the gold.
translation.zh: 赖斯 或许她能帮我们找到金子

translation.en: You're not afraid, are you, my child?
translation.zh: 我的孩子 你不怕吧？

translation.en: My sweetest son, I will keep you safe...
translation.zh: 我亲爱的儿子 我会保护你安全

translation.en: And she will never hurt you again.
When she's buried in the ground.
Did you think you could hide from me?
Did you think I wouldn't be able to find you?
translation.zh: 你以为我没办法找到你？

translation.en: What's the matter? Are you frightened?
Is your little heart beginning to pound?
translation.zh: 你的小心脏开始砰砰跳了吗？

translation.en: [man 4] Lilli! Get the rope! Grab the rope!
translation.zh: 莉莉 抓住绳子 抓绳子！

继续！ -快拉 葛伯特 撑着点！
-等等！

-快拉 葛伯特 撑着点！
-等等！

translation.en: Come on, Gilbert! Take hold of my hand!
translation.zh: 葛伯特 加油 抓住我的手！

translation.en: Would take some of this lovely soup to my husband?
translation.zh:
可否请你拿点
这美味的汤给我丈夫喝？

translation.en: Maybe we should have ransomed her.
translation.zh: 我们应该用她换赎金的

translation.en: She's brought nothing but black luck since she came here.
translation.zh: 自从她来之后 只有厄运降临
该死 大家都去哪里了？

translation.en: It's just the two of us now, Frederick.
translation.zh: 只剩下我们俩了 佛德列克

translation.en: Perhaps... the earth has swallowed her up.
translation.zh: 或许泥土已经吞噬了她

translation.en: Never look a raven in the eye for too long.
translation.zh: 别盯着乌鸦的眼睛看太久

translation.en: Might steal your soul and fly away with it.
Why are you staring at me?
It hadn't occurred to me to look anywhere else.
translation.zh: 我还没想到要看其它什么地方

translation.en: It's very rude. It's one of my better habits.
translation.zh:
-这样很无礼
-无礼正是我的专长

translation.en: I take it you have no manners then.
translation.zh: 那我猜你一定很没教养

translation.en: I was just wondering what it would take...
translation.zh: 我只是好奇 要怎样…

translation.en: I'm not a princess. What are you then?
I'm the daughter of Frederick Hoffman.
translation.zh: 我是佛德列克霍夫曼的女儿

translation.en: So you're nothing more than a name?
What right do you have to say that? You know nothing about me.
translation.zh: 你有何权利这样说？ 你对我的事一无所知

translation.en: I know enough of your kind.
translation.zh: 像你这种人我认识得够多了

translation.en: How could you know anything about anyone?
translation.zh: 你怎么可能知道任何人的事？

translation.en: You live like an animal. You hide out like a criminal.
translation.zh:
你像动物一样生活
像罪犯一样躲躲藏藏

translation.en: And what are you doing, Princess?
translation.zh:
那公主你自己呢？
你是出来度假的吗？

translation.en: -Is this some holiday you're taking? -My father will find me.
translation.zh:
那公主你自己呢？
你是出来度假的吗？ 我父亲会…

translation.en: Where is this great father of yours? How come he hasn't rescued you?
translation.zh:
你那个伟大的父亲呢？
他怎么还没来救你？

translation.en: He'll find me, I know it!
-I don't like the way you speak to me. -How would you have me speak?
translation.zh: 我不喜欢你对我说话的方式 你要我怎么说话？

translation.en: Like a civilized gentleman, not some savage.
translation.zh: 像个有教养的绅士 而不是像野人

translation.en: That is a word I will not bear from the lips of any man or woman.
translation.zh: 不管是谁 我都不容许 他们说出这两个字

translation.en: The last time I heard that word spoken...
it was by one of your so-called gentlemen...
translation.zh: 正是你口中所称的绅士

translation.en: and there was nothing gentle about it...
Oh, Lady Hoffman. Excuse me, I...
translation.zh: 霍夫曼夫人 真抱歉

translation.en: I was expecting one of your servants.
translation.zh: 我以为应该是仆人出来接待

translation.en: They became very ill... quite suddenly.
translation.zh:
-他们都突然生了病
-这里出了什么事？

-他们都突然生了病
-这里出了什么事？ 连看他们一眼都很可怕
连看他们一眼都很可怕

translation.en: Their hands and their feet were... filled with blood, and their faces--
translation.zh: 他们的手脚都是血 脸上也

translation.en: I didn't want to send them away. They were like our family.
translation.zh:
我不想赶他们走
他们就像我们的家人

translation.en: You were compelled to do so.

translation.zh:
有好多事情发生
加上莉莉仍然失踪…

有好多事情发生
加上莉莉仍然失踪… -是的
-还有佛德列克

translation.en: I'm trying to be strong, but...
I have no one to turn to...

translation.zh: 没人能安慰我 了解我

translation.en: What a fine young man you are.
What a wonderful husband you're going to make Lilli.
-Will you find her for me? -Yes, of course.
translation.zh: 你会替我找到她吗？ 会 当然

translation.en: I can rely on you then?
I'll tell Frederick you called. He's much better.
translation.zh: 我会告诉佛德列克你来过了 他好多了

translation.en: They tied him to a stake, then burned his family while he watched.
translation.zh: 他们把他绑在柱子上 让他眼睁睁看着家人被烧死

translation.en: Then they placed a red-hot cross of iron on his face...
translation.zh:
然后他们把烧红的铁十字架
烙上他的脸

translation.en: He would not fight for their cause.
translation.zh: 他不肯为他们的事业而战

translation.en: -[Will] Lilli, no! -[Lilli] We can't leave him! [Will] No!
translation.zh:
-莉莉 不要
-我们不能丢下他

translation.en: -[Will] Let go! There's no time! -[screaming] No!
While your child lies cold and still?
Take back the child, and give him life.
translation.zh: 把孩子找回 让他重生

translation.en: Bathe the child in the father's blood.
translation.zh: 让孩子浸在父亲的血里
佛德列克的命… 换他的

translation.en: Hello, Frederick. Did you miss me?
translation.zh: 哈啰 佛德列克 你想我吗？

translation.en: My poor husband. Look at your arm. What happened to you?
translation.zh:
可怜的丈夫 看看你的手臂
怎么回事？

translation.en: -Where have you been? -Shh. Where are the servants? I looked--
translation.zh: 你到哪去了？仆人们都去哪儿了？

translation.en: I want to free you of your misery for a little while.
translation.zh: 我想稍微减轻你的痛苦

translation.en: I want to give you a moment of peace...
What are you doing to me?
It's what any wife would gladly do for her husband.
translation.zh: 做妻子乐意为丈夫做的事

translation.en: I have seen our child, Frederick.
translation.zh: 我看到我们的孩子了 佛德列克

translation.en: I want you to give him life.
The life he was meant to have.
You must become like the serpent.
The serpent's fruit is what you need.
translation.zh: 蛇的果实正是你需要的

translation.en: Forgive me for startling you, my dear.
translation.zh: 原谅我吓着你了 亲爱的

translation.en: You look troubled. Are you lost?
translation.zh: 你看来很烦恼 你迷路了吗？

translation.en: Good. Make sure you're out of the forest by nightfall.
translation.zh: 很好 记得在天黑前走出森林

translation.en: There are creatures here, men... and beasts.
translation.zh: 这里有猛兽、野人和猛兽

translation.en: Oh, deary. Do you want an apple? I have another one.
translation.zh: 亲亲 你要苹果吗？我还有一个

translation.en: I have no way to pay you for one.
Two ladies on the road together.
Well, don't just look at it, deary. Eat it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 别光看 亲亲 吃吧

translation.en: I'll share it with a friend.
Life is sweet when you're young, eh?
translation.zh: 年轻时生命可真甜蜜 对吧？

translation.en: So, tell me, what's he like?
translation.zh: 那么告诉我 他人怎样？

translation.en: And he's kind and gentle and...
And you love him, don't you?
You can tell me, your old granny. [chuckles]
What's the matter, dear? Cat got your tongue?
translation.zh: 怎么了 亲爱的？说不出话来吗？
给我一个吻吧 亲亲

translation.en: You can see, and you can hear,
but from inside the tomb of your mind.
No breath will escape your lips, no tears your eyes.
translation.zh: 一丝气息也出不来 眼里流不出泪

translation.en: To the world, you are dead.
translation.zh: 对世界来说 你已死

translation.en: And soon, even your precious father will forget you were ever alive.
translation.zh:
很快连你那宝贵的父亲
也会忘了你的存在

translation.en: You will have all eternity to remember.
translation.zh: 你却有永恒的时间… 记住这一切

-莉莉安娜
-你怎么知道她的名字？

translation.en: -We're going to be married. -Can you help her?
translation.zh:
-我们原本要结婚的
-你能救她吗？

translation.en: -Can you help her, please? -I said, I don't know yet!
translation.zh: 请你救救她好吗？ 我说了 我还不知道

translation.en: I said her limbs are stiffening.
translation.zh: 我说她的四肢正逐渐变硬

translation.en: There's nothing more I can do.
I'm going home. I'm going to take her back to her family for a proper burial.
translation.zh:
我要回去
我要把她带回家 好好埋葬

translation.en: I demand you stop this at once.
[panting] I brought someone... to keep you company.
She knew I would come back.
I'm going to go find her.
I'm going to find my father.
Go away. My daughter is dead.
translation.zh: 走开 我女儿已经死了

translation.en: Take my father out of here.

translation.zh: 身为一个在地底腐烂的村姑

translation.en: for a little wench who's been rotting in the ground.
the moment you took your first breath.
It was like a knife in my heart.
translation.zh: 就像我心上被插了一刀似的

translation.en: I've seen what you've done to my father.
translation.zh: 我看到你是如何对待我父亲的了

translation.en: He is alive in this room.
Oh, dear, don't point that thing at me.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 别用那东西指着我

translation.en: What have you done to me?
What have you done to me?
What have you done to me?
